b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:blog.title + (data:skin.vars.tagline ? data:skin.vars.separator + data:skin.vars.tagline : "") : data:view.isError ? "404 (Error) Not Found" + data:skin.vars.separator + data:blog.title : data:blog.pageName ? data:blog.pageName + data:skin.vars.separator + data:blog.title : "Latest Posts" + data:skin.vars.separator + data:blog.title

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: "Upload image from computer" > Save > Edit Again > Get URL

div.class: col-lg-4 px-3 pb-5 separator-main position-relative ms-auto

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: This is an aspiring community for developers, designers, and business people. My aims to explore, collect, as well as share useful news, tutorials, tips, resources and tools, on design, development and other inspirational topics. I am expect that everyone will find something here that is useful and interesting. I am always believe that quality is better than quality and hence you will find all quality resources for web development.
Stay up to date with the latest news and relevant updates from us.
